classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on pre-sales, client relationship management, and advising on existing big data analytics platforms. While it mentions Spark programming and technical understanding, it lacks the core responsibilities of building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile.
